descriptor.name: dummy-name
descriptor.short_desc: Established in 1992, Bodycare has emerged as India's foremost and highly reliable brand for top-notch Kids wear and Thermals & Socks for Men, Women & Kids. We proudly serve millions of satisfied customers nationwide through 17000+ Retailers, major online marketplaces, our official website & Exclusive brand outlets. Our products are acclaimed for their innovation, quality, and comfort, complemented by a delightful range of licensed cartoon characters. "Toh Aapne …Comfort Ke Liye, Bodycare Kiya Kya?"
descriptor.long_desc: Established in 1992, Bodycare has emerged as India's foremost and highly reliable brand for top-notch Kids wear and Thermals & Socks for Men, Women & Kids. We proudly serve millions of satisfied customers nationwide through 17000+ Retailers, major online marketplaces, our official website & Exclusive brand outlets. Our products are acclaimed for their innovation, quality, and comfort, complemented by a delightful range of licensed cartoon characters. "Toh Aapne …Comfort Ke Liye, Bodycare Kiya Kya?"

descriptor.name: dummy-name
descriptor.short_desc: Bodycare Boys Solid Shorts - Tomato Red
descriptor.long_desc: Bodycare promises to fulfill the wardobe of your little one with casual comfort. We, at Bodycare Kids never overlook this and always strive towards giving the best for the sensitive skin of your little one. Infant can rejoice with the unique and stylish range of comfort varieties in our specially crafted infant wear. The material used in all our happy wear range is designed in such a way that it will never hurt the skin and the child can comfortably move around. We care for your baby just like you.
